name: Scott's Sweet Potato and Butternut Squash Mashers
author: scottg
summary: Mashed sweet potato and butternut squash. This is a recipe that tastes great with no salt or sugar added and contains lots of fiber.
ingredients: 1  butternut squash- peeled, seeded and cubed
¼ cup sugar free maple flavored syrup
directions: Place the sweet potatoes and butternut squash into a large pot and cover with water
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes
Drain and allow to steam dry for a minute or two
Mash the sweet potatoes and butternut squash, then add cinnamon, nutmeg, and syrup
